text: Matthieu Lo Ying Ping (,born 3 August 1986) is a French male badminton player. Born to a Chinese father and a French mother, He started playing badminton at aged 10 at the Union St Bruno Club in Bordeaux, 4 years later he joined Espoir de Talence Bordeaux and when he was 18 he joined the France national badminton team at INSEP. In 2005, he won bronze medal at the European Junior Badminton Championships in boys' doubles event. == Achievements == ===Mediterranean Games=== Men's Singles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" ! |Year ! |Venue ! |Opponent ! |Score ! |Result |- style="background:#FFAAAA" | align="center" |2013 | align="left" |Mersin University Hall, Mersin, Turkey | align="left" | Iztok Utroša | align="left" |21-17, 21-17 | style="text- align:left;
